articles.title: Muslim woman in US ordered to move from emergency row seats, told she could 'bring the whole plane down' - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: American-born Fatima Altakrouri says a Southwest attendant said she "couldn’t speak English and would bring the whole plane down in an emergency”.
articles.content:
American-born and raised Muslim woman Fatima Altakrouri says she was discriminated against by a Southwest Airlines attendant for wearing her hijab.

articles.title: JBS Canada beef processing facility in Alberta resumes production after cyberattack - CTV Toronto

articles.content:
